divs: Sighting DetailsThere was (6) of us outside just around dusk when we heard this noise like a corn chopper. But in our area who chops corn at night? Then the sound was really close and then we saw the UFO in sky coming towards us and then it stopped turned right and paused. I pointed a flashlight at it then it turned left again and proceded to got northeast. There were no lights at all it was just a solid black triange object going slow. We never got pictures because it was dusk and getting dark. WOW!!!
trends: There have been no other sightings in Burke
This sighting has never been favorited.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: Dark Black Triangle With loud sounds Like a corn chopper Sound
